MF DOOM, Flying Lotus, Lorde, and More Featured on “Grand Theft Auto V” Soundtrack

posted by Andres Tardio on November 18, 2014 in News
« PreviousShift + ← Next »Shift + → 1 of
Image via Facebook

Grand Theft Auto V’s upgrade is now in stores and, of course, the video game’s soundtrack has also been updated with several new jams. The new edition of Grand Theft Auto V’s soundtrack features new music from MF DOOM, Flying Lotus, Danny Brown, Action Bronson and Freddie Gibbs, among others. In fact there are 162 additions in this upgrade which is available for Xbox One and Playstation 4 now with a PC edition to follow in January. In between those dates, Mass Appeal Records is set to release a limited edition box set for Grand Theft Auto V December 9.

A breakdown of the new songs is available below via Pitchfork.

Lowdown:

New Songs:
01 Pleasure: “Bouncy Lady”
02 Ohio Players: “Climax”
03 Jackson Sisters: “I Believe in Miracles”
04 War: “Magic Mountain”
05 The Delfonics: “Funny Feeling”
06 Brass Construction: “Changin'”
07 Johnny Guitar Watson: “Superman Lover”
08 The Chakachas: “Stories”
